sqlMap.statement: SELECT SUBSTR(BJOBMSGSCHEID, 3,3 ) AS "WORKGRPCD", BJOBMSGSCHEID AS "BJOBMSGSCHEID", BATCHTYPE AS "BATCHTYPE", THISMSGSCHEDESC AS "THISMSGSCHEDESC", SNDRCVSTARTHMS AS "SNDRCVSTARTHMS", SNDRCVENDHMS AS "SNDRCVENDHMS", DAYCYCLETIME AS "DAYCYCLETIME", SCHEKIND AS "SCHEKIND", THISMSGUSEYN AS "THISMSGUSEYN", THISMSGREGSNTID AS "THISMSGREGSNTID", THISMSGREGIHMS AS "THISMSGREGIHMS", THISMSGAMNDRID AS "THISMSGAMNDRID", THISMSGAMNDHMS AS "THISMSGAMNDHMS" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES07 WHERE BjobMsgScheID =#bjobMsgScheID#
SELECT A.INTFID AS "INTFID" , B.INTFNAME AS "INTFNAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES09 A, $schemaId$.TSEAIEA04 B WHERE A.IntfId =B.IntfId AND A.BjobMsgScheID =#bjobMsgScheID# ORDER BY A.IntfId
